Articles.Content: So I planned to set up a proper mun base, I have a temp one next to my mun buggy that took me 6 hours in real life to drive to as my landings still needed work at the time. I clicked on the mission/ship/w.e and started to load the kerbs on the mun buggy, as Bob got in with Jeb this happened..... I think Bob is a tad over weight i think. I did not press any keys and I drive in Dock mode so i can not flip it unless I turn too sharp or drive too fast and I was stationed and the breaks was on.
Bob has got to stop eating at KerbDonald's before a mission...
Did someone at the space center have a birthday recently? I think Bob may have had one slice of cake too many. *coughandbyoneImeanseveralhundredcough*
Sadly for poor Bob, it looks like low gravity alone won't help his weight.
